entries.meaning: The sound of an engine revving up.
examples: Our ears are assaulted with the screeching of tires, the crashing of trash cans, the exaggerated vrooms of a revving engine.

verbs.description: vroom (third-person singular simple present vrooms, present participle vrooming, simple past and past participle vroomed)

entries.meaning: (informal) To move with great speed; to zoom.
